resources.string: Adobe Flash Player is not installed!
In order to run LocalTV properly you have to install Adobe Flash Player! You can dowload it for free from \'Google Play Store\' or from my \'Website\'.
You are not conected to the internet!
Watching TV consumes a lot of data. I recommend the use of a wireless network.
Is a local station missing? If it\'s possible I will add it (only local and special interest channels!). Click the email and tell me your wishes. \n\n androider@wolke7.net
© 2012 by Koni\n\nContents belong to their respective copyright holders. LocalTV has no connection to the provider of the internet streams.

LocalTV has arisen because I missed a couple of TV channels on my Android device. The goal of LocalTV is to provide a few smaller local and special interest television channels on your Android device. The bigger, more commercial stations can be found here. You can find them at:
Some local stations do not have a live internet stream. However, they have a large archive of shows. To get quickly to the recent broadcasts I\'ve added a link to their broadcast archives.

For full screen…
…long press on the image, then the full-screen button.
…
or use the small square button on the bottom bar.
This station does not have a live stream to the internet.\nBut have fun browsing the archive!
